overview: 4 A.M. It begins with a familiar scene, and something weâ€™ve probably all endured at some point. Insomnia. Somewhat nostalgic memories in my head slips through my dreams. It's an experimental film about insomnia, nostalgic memories, dreams, reality becomes one. Everyone suffers from their own depression, and in this film, trying to understand one's liminal mind space.
title: Insomnia - 4:00 Am
